ing: 1/4 cup ice cubes, or as desired
1/2 cup frozen blueberries, or to taste
1 tablespoon white sugar, or to taste
des: "I have made many smoothies in my time and this one, I honestly cannot get enough...and neither will you!"
ins: Blend ice in a blender until crumbly; add yogurt, milk, blueberries, and cinnamon. Blend until smooth. Taste smoothie and add desired amount of sugar; blend.
